|chip2 = |chip3 = |chip4 = |antconn = MHF4 |txchains = 2 |rxchains = 2 |sstreams = 2 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |802.11ac = 867 |nqam = |802.11n = 300/300 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |802.11a = 54 |wififreq = 2.4 or 5 |receive_sens = |transmit_power = |linuxdriv = |windriv = |is_manuf = Yes |addchip = |flags = Wave2, VHT80, MU-MIMO, Bluetooth 4.2, |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 08/29/2016 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |country = China |powledcolor = |connactled = |spdledcolor = |leddupcolor = |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== {{See also|AzureWave Wireless Adapters}} *[[Realtek#ac]] RTL8822BE - PCIe 1.1 (WLAN)/USB 2.0 (BT) :802.11abgn+ac 2T2R (2x2:2), Wave2, MU-MIMO, BT 4.2 *[[AzureWave AW-CB295NF]] • ([[10ec]]:b822/[[1a3b]]:2951) :''802.11ac WLAN/BT 4.2 Combo NGFF (M.2) Module'' :802.11ac 2T2R, Wave2, MU-MIMO, VHT80, BT 4.2 :M.2 2230 (Key A/E), MHF4, PCIe (WiFi) / USB (BT) :Bluetooth 2.1/3.0 (EDR)/4.2 LE (MCU) ([[13d3]]:3531) :[[Realtek]] RTL8822BE • [[Realtek reference design]] *[[Realtek RTL8822BE Combo Module]] (NGFF) :''802.11abgn/ac RTL8822BE Combo Module'' :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TX2-RTL8822BE TX2-RTL8822BE] (2016-08-29) :OEM: [[Foxconn]] (Hon Hai) U98H133.[https://www.ebay.es/itm/Realtek-RTL8822CE-Wireless-Wifi-Bluetooth-4-1-NGFF-Card-802-11-b-a-n-ac-/253994404574 00] *[http://pci-ids.ucw.cz/read/PC/10ec/b822 PCI ID: '''10ec:b822''' on ''pci-ids.ucw.cz''] :[[ASUS]] [https://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=2392043 ''VivoBook'' 15" X570UD Laptop] :PCI ID: ([[10ec]]:b822/[[1a3b]]:2950) WLAN :USB ID: ([[13d3]]:3530) - Bluetooth 4.2 
 Network controller [0280]: Realtek Semiconductor Co., Ltd. 
 Device [10ec:b822] Subsystem: AzureWave Device [1a3b:2950]
 Kernel modules: r8822be
*Linux drivers: [[rtw88]] • [[rtlwifi_new]] :[https://lwn.net/Articles/768372/ rtw88] • [https://github.com/lwfinger/rtlwifi_new rtlwifi_new] • [https://marc.info/?l=linux-netdev&m=150299204509065 r8822be] ==Links of Interest== [https://storage.googleapis.com/wzukusers/user-26561200/documents/5b7d0ef04a284GIqLC6i/AW-CB295NF_DS_B1-V10_STD-20180606.pdf Datasheet] ==See also== *[[AzureWave AW-CE123H]] - 802.11ac WLAN/BT 4.0 PCIe Mini Card • [http://www.embeddedworks.net/wlan507.html BD] *[[AzureWave AW-CB295NF]] - 802.11ac WLAN/BT Combo Module • [https://storage.googleapis.com/wzukusers/user-26561200/documents/5b7d0ef04a284GIqLC6i/AW-CB295NF_DS_B1-V10_STD-20180606.pdf DS] *[[AzureWave AW-CM389NF]] - 802.11ac WLAN/BT Combo Module • [https://storage.googleapis.com/wzukusers/user-26561200/documents/5b7d0fccd80bcEDRCVCF/AW-CM389NF-DS-Rev1.2.pdf DS] *[[AzureWave AW-CM256SM]] - Wireless (SD Stamp) Module • [https://storage.googleapis.com/wzukusers/user-26561200/documents/5b7d0fe3c3f29Ct6k0QI/AW-CM256SM_DS_Rev%2015_CYW.pdf Datasheet] *[[AzureWave AW-CH387]] - 802.11ac WLAN/BT 4.0/NFC SiP Module • [http://www.embeddedworks.net/wlan563.html LGA] *[[AzureWave AW-CH397]] - 802.11ac WLAN/BT/NFC SiP Module • [http://www.embeddedworks.net/wlan532.html SDIO 3.0] *[[AzureWave AW-CU362]] - Bluetooth Module • [https://storage.googleapis.com/wzukusers/user-26561200/documents/5c5e9f0d4476bmfq2ZxC/AW-CU362_DS_DF_V07_STD_Renewed.pdf Datasheet] [[Category:English Documentation]]
